title: Kool & The Gang - Cherish (Big Papi)
description:
[torrent=10000386]
[torrent=9219504]

[center]

[i]Most of us held in our hands love that slipped away. Love lost. More than once. The first love was as a child, another 6 year old who gave us attention for reasons we did not understand. We shunned them. Then in our early teens someone we really cared about then disposed of them once we had them. Then a couple years later someone had our hearts then threw us away just as easily. Then maybe fiance's or marriage, and the other person shut us out and gave attention to others.

What I'm saying is this song can rip your heart out. What's left of your heart. As you realize that depth of love is for others. Never for you.

If you are lucky and have this thing you cherish do not ever take it for granted and do not ever stop fighting to keep it.

So for the rest of us? We are pirates.  Go grab that other pirate and make it a night the other person will never forget. At least we got that.[/i]


[img]https://yuq.me/users/15/891/RsYC19o34G.jpg[/img]
[b]Kool & The Gang - Cherish[/b]

Let's take a walk together near the ocean shore
Hand in hand, you and I
Let's cherish every moment we have been given
For time is passing by

I often pray before I lay down by your side
If you receive your calling before I awake
Could I make it through the night

Cherish the love we have
We should cherish the life we live (oh)
Cherish the love, cherish the life, cherish the love

The world is always changing, nothing stays the same
But love will stand the test of time
The next life that we live in remains to be seen
Will you be by my side

I often pray before I lay down by your side
And if you receive your calling before I awake
Could I make it through the night?

Cherish the love we have
We should cherish the life we live (Baby, yeah)
Cherish the love, cherish the life, cherish the love

Cherish the love we have
(Let's cherish every moment we have together)
For as long as we both shall live
(Hand in hand, you and I)
Cherish the love, cherish the life, cherish the love

Cherish the life
